title_activity_terms_and_conditions title_activity_privact_policy
//strings for FAQ what is smart points? Smartpoints is a reward program that enables you to "earn points every time you make a purchase" at a Smartpoints Store, you are instantly rewarded with Smartpoints which is credited into your Smartpoints Account
.How does the reward system work? Its simple. When you spend at any Smartpoints Store you earn a reward as a token of thank you from our partner Store for doing business with them. For e.g.: If they are running an assured reward of 5% Smartpoints reward and you make a purchase of INR 1000, you would be entitled to EARN 50 Smartpoints.
are there any joining fee? No its free and always will be
what is reedem? . You can use Smartpoints reward program by just downloading it from the google playstore or taking the app from our partner and installing it on to your device and you are ready to earn smartpoints.?
What is my Eligibility criteria . You should be having a smartphone with android version 4.0 or above.
Is it compulsory to have the Smartpoints app? Yes its compulsory. And there are great advantages if you have the app! track the Smartpoints you recieved from our Smartpoints Stores at your fingertips Manage your Smartpoints account,smartpoints earned and redeemed across Stores . Stay updated about latest offers from all the retailers. As new retailers keep joining the program, their offers will be instantly available to you
Will I get a card that I need to carry every time I spend at a Smartpoints Store? No, its a card-less program. Your smartphone is your unique identity Every time you wish to do a transaction at a Smartpoints Store, all you have to do is scan the qr code and follow the steps.
How do I track my Smartpoints You can check your Smartpoints in our mobile app.
How does the merchant know whether I am a Smartpoints member or not? How do I identify myself? There is no physical or digital card as your identity. It is your smartphone which is your unique identity. If you are not a Smartpoints member yet, when you are in any of the Smartpoints Store, you can download our app from google playstore or ask the owner of the store to give you the app.
What is the process to Earn, Track and Redeem my Smartpoints? . Once you install the smartpoints app you can find out our merchant partners. Spot the Smartpoints logo, at the transacting Store to earn Smartpoints. You can track your accumulated Smartpoints on our Smartpoints app or by calling us on our helpline number. Whenever you shop at any Smartpoints Store, you can redeem your Smartpoints against your bill.
What is the value of my Smartpoints ? One Smartpoint is equal to 1 rupee.
